title: Efficient results on fractional Langevin-Sturm-Liouville problem via generalized Caputo-Atangana-Baleanu derivatives
content:
by Sabri T. M. Thabet, Abdelatif Boutiara, Mohammad Esmael Samei, Imed Kedim, Miguel Vivas-Cortez

In this paper, we investigate the generalized Langevin-Sturm-Liouville differential problems involving Caputo-Atangana-Baleanu fractional derivatives of higher orders with respect to another positive, increasing function denoted by œÅ. The fixed point theorems in the framework of Kransnoselskii and Banach are utilized to discuss the existence and uniqueness of the results. In addition, the stability criteria of Ulam-Hyers, generalize Ulam-Hyers, Ulam-Hyers-Rassias, and generalize Ulam-Hyers-Rassias are investigated by non-linear analysis besides fractional calculus. Finally, illustrative examples are reinforced by tables and graphics to describe the main achievements.
author: Sabri T. M. Thabet
